p:
We conducted a gene ontology (GO) enrichment analysis on differentially expressed genes using the GOseq package in R (v. 3.4.2) to identify overrepresentation of certain GO terms
76 . The GOseq package determines enrichment of specific GO terms by incorporating the probability a gene will be differentially expressed based upon length of the gene. The GOseq procedure uses aÂ random selection process to evaluate the GO category membership and enrichment by randomly sampling the given dataset to generate a suitable null distribution. Upon identifying the distribution, GOseq evaluates each GO term for under- and overrepresentation. We conducted GO term enrichment on the DGE analysis and the weighted gene co-expression analysis. For enrichment analyses, we removed GO terms with less than 10 and more than 500 genes within a category to reduce enrichment sensitivity and redundancy
77 .
